snippet: Inappropriate behavior and language during practices led to a three-game ban and a $50,000 fine for Mike Rice, the men’s basketball coach.
abstract: Rutgers men’s basketball coach Mike Rice is suspended three games and fined $50,000 for inappropriate behavior and language during practices.
lead_paragraph: Inappropriate behavior and language during practices led to a three-game ban and a $50,000 fine for Mike Rice, the men’s basketball coach.

headline.seo: Rutgers Suspends Coach Mike Rice From Basketball Team
headline.main: Rutgers Suspends Coach for Three Games, Citing Behavior
headline.print_headline: Rutgers Suspends Coach for Three Games, Citing Behavior
